name: Naming Jam!
description:
Use this little artifact to help you on the difficult task of exploring possibilities for Product, Services and Company Naming!


This has been developed to help you clarify your train of thoughts when researching and exploring different path or ideas for this kind of projects. Hope you find it useful to also work with your teams, having in name that sometimes we struggle with having all the ideas put together and also trying to combine and re-combine different approaches, categories and etymologies.


Hope you find this one encouraging into deep-exploration of your naming projects and move forward into the concept creation!


SPECIAL MENTIONS:


Full credit to Rogie King for the amazing Simple Vote plug-in integrated here!
